songs.title: Mad*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Verse]
I was in high school
I ain't give fuck about rules
I don't give fuck about you
I don't give fuck about you
Ride 'round town lil' dizzy off the Xans
Got a bean on me, pop that before I land

[Chorus]
I'ma go smash (I'ma go smash)
250 my dash (250 my dash)
Niggas get mad (Niggas get mad)
Niggas be mad (Niggas be mad)
They wishin' I crashed (Wishin' I crashed)
They wishin' I lacked (Wishin' I lacked)
